Hydras/Perceptor:

"Like what, Nightshift?"hissed malicious Hydras while he=
 came in and sit down in his trone "Like what information=A1?"

he woke up 


From: Sandy 
Sent: Monday, April 05, 2010 8:33 AM
To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: BlackFortress


  
Nightshift watches Scorpon=
ok. He tries to remain calm and collected, acting like a sly Decepticon. In=
side he was nervous. If they found out his true faction he would clearly be=
 done for. His resemblence to Tucson's old form was impecable, yet the only=
 thing that separated him from Tucson was his black paint job and his accen=
t. He had been manufactured using the same specs and the same programming. =
Hopefully his configurations would not be found out.

" What? What'reya loo=
kn' at me like that for? I told ya everything ya need ta know and if I was =
one of them I wouldn'tve done that would I? Nope, not me, look, you guys ca=
n trust me, I'm a Decepticon, I may not be able ta fly but I am one of you =
guys. And thanks ta me ya now know that Tucson's got 'emself a hell of an u=
pgrade. No Autobot would give ya that kinda info."

He transforms back into=
 SUV mode.

"C'mon, I got lots more info where that came from. But I can't =
tell ya here. We better get somewhere private where I can give ya the entir=
e scoop."

Again, his tires kick up dust around Scorponok.

"My bad, my bad=
. Slag, might be time for me ta get new tires."
